name: Shortsighted Chicken 🐔
description:
When light fades to darkness, your ears is all you can rely on.

Collect as many butterflies as possible in a limited time. As darkness takes over, the only way to catch them is by carefully tracking the sound they make.

Sound required, headphones advised.

Created in 48h for the r/SoloDevelopment Game Jam. (theme: Minimalism)
